com.CMPUT301W20T24.OnMyWay

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.CMPUT301W20T24.OnMyWay.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    An class used to represent users of the app (either drivers or riders)

      • addRating

        public void addRating(boolean isPositive)
        Adds a rating to the users profile. If isPositive is true, it adds a positive rating. Otherwise it adds a negative rating. This way totalRatings are always updated along with upRatings to prevent errors
        Parameters:
        isPositive - A boolean indicating whether the rating is positive or negative

      • getUserId

        public java.lang.String getUserId()

        public boolean isDriver()
        Returns true if the user is a driver and false otherwise
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the user is a driver or not

        public java.lang.String getRating()
        Calculates and returns the user's 2-digit rating out of 5, using the number of upRatings and totalRatings

        A 2-digit string representing the user's rating out of 5
